page.title: 09EDUCATION 2 BISHOP THORNTON
page.content: We are very lucky in this area as we have 6 very good comprehensive schools to choose from according to parents preference - Upper Nidderdale High School, pateley bridge 340 pupils approximatley Harrogate Granby High School 1835 pupils approximatley Harrogate Grammar 1600 pupils approxmatley Rossett High School 1350 pupils approxmatley St. Aidans C.E. School 1355 pupils " St. John Fishers R.C. school 900 " " In November every year the schools arrange meetings so that parents and children visit & decide which school is suitable for their particular child. Later on they must complete the parents preference form giving the order of choice which they have made. In most cases this is possible.
